paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the quickest flow problem in a network which consists of a directed graph with capacities and transit times on its arcs. We present an 0(n log n) time algorithm for the quickest flow problem in a network of grid structure with uniform arc capacity which has a single sink where n is the number of vertices in the network.
paper_title: An efficient algorithm for evacuation problem in dynamic network flows with uniform arc capacity
